member.name: T:ModTool.Shared.Editor.AssetUtility
member.summary: A set of utilities for handling assets.

member.name: M:ModTool.Shared.Editor.AssetUtility.GetModToolDirectory
member.summary: Finds and returns the directory where ModTool is located.
member.returns: The directory where ModTool is located.

member.name: M:ModTool.Shared.Editor.AssetUtility.GetRelativePath(System.String)
member.summary: Get the relative path for an absolute path.

member.name: M:ModTool.Shared.Editor.AssetUtility.GetAssets(System.String)
member.summary: Get all asset paths for assets that match the filter.
member.param: The filter string can contain search data for: names, asset labels and types (class names).

member.name: M:ModTool.Shared.Editor.AssetUtility.MoveAssets(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String}@)
member.param: The directory to move all assets to.

member.name: M:ModTool.Shared.Editor.AssetUtility.CreateAsset(UnityEngine.ScriptableObject)
member.summary: Create an asset for a ScriptableObject in a ModTool Resources directory.

member.name: M:ModTool.Shared.Editor.AssetUtility.ChangeGUIDs(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Change the GUIDs of the given assets. Empty fields or list will be ignored.
